meta.title: Contact
meta.description: Get in touch about roles, projects, or ideas.

sections.workWithMe: I work at the intersection of operations, systems, and software — helping organizations bring clarity to complex work and create environments where people can move with confidence.
sections.intro: If you’d like to talk about a role, a project, or an idea, feel free to reach out. Whether you have something fully formed or you’re still shaping the problem, I’m always open to a thoughtful conversation.
sections.auroraNote: If you’re curious about Aurora, I’m happy to talk about its concepts and direction at a high level — the ideas, the patterns, and the possibilities behind a more conversational approach to software.
sections.confirmationMessage: Thank you for reaching out — I appreciate it, and I’ll get back to you soon.
